Principal Duties and Responsibilities:
  • Applies engineering, science, and business skills to carry out core functions in the thermal purification, manufacture, and processing of products
  • Develops execution sequence, optimizes resource needs, and prepares operation sheets
  • Collects, interprets, and analyzes data to write reports and make recommendations to justify process improvement and capital projects
  • Provides technical and engineering support to other engineers and production leadership
  • Assess production processes through the interpretation of data
  • Leads implementation of process changes to reduce the standard production costs
  • Maintains up to date knowledge regarding milling and grinding technology
  • Other duties as assigned
Education/Experience- Knowledge, Skills & Abilities:
  • Bachelor of Science in Chemical Engineering, Industrial Engineering or in a related field
  • Minimum of three years of relevant experience
  • Experience with CAD, Finite Element Analysis (FEA), and/or Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD) preferred
  • Experience in Safety, Health, Environmental task and operations review
  • Process control exposure preferred
Physical Qualifications:

Vision: Normal Required

Hearing: Normal Required

Reaching/Stretching: Normal Required

Standing/Walking/Mobility: Normal Required

Climbing/Stooping/Kneeling: Normal Required

Lifting/Pulling/Pushing: Normal Required

Fingering/Grasping/Feeling: Normal Required

Capable of lifting 50 lbs on a periodic basis

Work Environment:

This individual works in a multi-level industrial environment requiring work in high precarious places via ladders and steps inside and outside the plant in all types of weather conditions. This individual is regularly exposed to moving mechanical parts, fumes or airborne particles, and some hazardous chemicals. The plant utilizes high levels of electricity and individuals have to be safety minded in all activities. The work environment is dusty.

Noise:

Moderate - Industrial noise levels characteristic of moving mechanical equipment
